alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 1:01PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL DE SOTO AND CENTRAL SABINE PARISHES...EAST CENTRAL NACOGDOCHES...SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY...SAN AUGUSTINE AND SABINE COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM CST... At 101 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Macune, or 26 miles south of Center, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Milam, Many, San Augustine, Zwolle, Hemphill, Pineland, Converse, Patroon, Bland Lake, Rosevine, Macune, Florien, Chireno, Huxley, Noble, Fisher, Broaddus, Bronson, Chinaquapin, and Hurstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern Texas.
